short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that allows the user to create a simple checklist, includes ChatGPT integration allowing for easy checklist generation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple checklist app. My first real chrome extension!
VERSION LOG:
v1.0.0 - release
v1.5.0 - Lots of improvements! UI is significantly better, and items can now be crossed out instead of just deleted. Click on the text to cross it out, or the trash icon to delete the entire item.
v2.0.0 - ChatGPT integration added! Simply type or paste any text you want turned into a checklist into the textbox on the bottom, hit enter, and ChatGPT will generate a checklist for you!
